clinical_study.brief_title: A Decentralized Study to Evaluate Physical Activity and Cough Frequency Using Wearable Technology in Cystic Fibrosis
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 4 Decentralized Pilot Study With Wearable Technology in Cystic Fibrosis Subjects 18 Years of Age and Older Taking Commercial Elexacaftor/Tezacaftor/Ivacaftor

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the performance of wearable technology in cystic fibrosis (CF) participants taking commercial Elexacaftor (ELX)/Tezacaftor (TEZ)/Ivacaftor (IVA) utilizing a fully decentralized trial design.

primary_outcome.measure: Compliance With Actigraphy Wearable Device Measured as Percentage of Time a Participant is Wearing the Actigraphy Wearable Device

secondary_outcome.measure: Compliance With Cough Measurement Device Measured as Percentage of Time a Participant is Wearing the Cough Measurement Device
Number of Steps per day and Variability in Number of Steps per day Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Number of steps will be reported as mean and variability will be reported as standard deviation (SD).

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Coughs per day and Variability in Number of Coughs per day Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Number of coughs will be reported as mean and variability will be reported as SD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time Spent Above Sedentary Physical Activity per day and Variability in Time Spent Above Sedentary Physical Activity per day Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Time spent above sedentary physical activity will be reported as mean and variability will be reported as SD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time Spent in Moderate-to-Vigorous Physical Activity per day and Variability in Time Spent in Moderate-to-Vigorous Physical Activity per day Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Time spent in moderate-to-vigorous physical activity will be reported as mean and variability will be reported as SD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time Spent in Continuous Walking Bouts per day and Variability in Time Spent in Continuous Walking Bouts per day Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Time spent in continuous walking bouts will be reported as mean and variability will be reported as SD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Total Activity Count per day and Variability in Total Activity Count per day Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Total activity count will be reported as mean and variability will be reported as SD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Best 6-Minute Effort (B6ME) and Variability in B6ME Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: B6ME will be reported as mean and variability will be reported as SD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Sleep Efficiency and Variability in Sleep Efficiency Over Time
secondary_outcome.description: Sleep efficiency measurements will be performed using wearable technology which include a wrist-worn actigraphy sensor. Sleep efficiency will be reported as mean and variability will be reported as SD.

arm_group.description: CF participants who are currently on a stable regimen of commercially available ELX/TEZ/IVA will be evaluated for the performance of wearable technology devices. Wearable devices include a wrist-worn actigraphy sensor and an ambulatory cough monitoring system.

study_pop.textblock: Participants with CF taking commercial ELX/TEZ/IVA will be enrolled in the study.
